full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@001A *, ,NA MO GU RU, RJE BTZUN SGROL MA BDAG DANG 'GRO BA KUN, ,GLO BUR NANG GI 'JIGS LAS SKYOBS MDZAD CIG ,MDO SNGAGS ZAB MO NYAMS SU LEN PA'I MTHUS, ,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @001B (BCES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA RDZA SAG SPU RGYAL PO MA nI BADZRA NAS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^DAM PA'I MTSAN GYIS RLABS SH'AKYA'I DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RANG SNANG GANG 'DOD DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI KHU BO CHOS RJE MKHAN PO YE SHES DGE LEGS SO, ,'DI SNANG DGAG MA THAG ,SHABMHA LAR SKYE NAS, ,RIG LDAN BYED BYA TE, ZUNG 'JUG MYUR THOB SHOG ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
